short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never forget to send a portion of your Amazon purchases to a charity ever again.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't let donations go to waste because you forgot to switch to the Smile website before making a purchase on Amazon. We'll do all of the remembering for you - just switch on our extension and we'll automatically make sure you checkout with Smile so that you always send a portion of your purchase to your favorite charity.
